name: Palaty
description: Palaty is a popular restaurant in Kutaisi, Georgia, known for its outstanding service and wide variety of flavors. It's a favorite among locals and visitors alike. The restaurant offers an authentic dining experience with favorites like Toma's Wine Cellar and Baraka Delicatessen. Palaty is highly recommended for those looking to experience the best flavors around Kutaisi. Whether you're interested in European cuisine or vegetarian-friendly options, Palaty has something for everyone.
reviewsOrAdvice: Highly recommended for experiencing the best local flavors with outstanding service.

name: Georgian cuisine Magnolia
description: Great location, delicious food and good atmosphere
reviewsOrAdvice: Perfect spot for traditional Georgian dishes in a pleasant setting.

name: Hacker-Pschorr Kutaisi
description: The best beer and food house in Kutaisi.
reviewsOrAdvice: Ideal for beer enthusiasts seeking a lively atmosphere and hearty food.

name: Pub Bzholebi
description: The best flavors at the best price
reviewsOrAdvice: Great value for money, offering delicious flavors without breaking the bank.

name: Kutaisi Gardenia
description: Bar-Restaurant 'Kutaisi Gardenia' is located in the historical center of Kutaisi, in the area of cultural heritage monuments. The restaurant is distinguished by its ecological environment and natural beauty, as well as delicious cuisine and reasonable prices.
reviewsOrAdvice: Enjoy delicious cuisine in a beautiful, natural setting within the historical center.

name: Argonauts
description: Georgian restaurant in the city center.
reviewsOrAdvice: A central location for authentic Georgian dining.

name: Story
reviewsOrAdvice: Perfect for a comfortable and warm family meal experience.

name: Maisis Ezo
description: Cozy Restaurant with live music and poetry evenings
reviewsOrAdvice: Experience a unique blend of cozy dining with cultural entertainment.

name: Bikentia's Kebabery
description: The best place for beer and kebab! Must-visit place in Kutaisi.
reviewsOrAdvice: An essential stop for superb kebab and beer in Kutaisi.

name: Gala Restaurant Kutaisi
description: Itâ€™s absolutely wonderful that at this place, you can not only taste delicious food but also cook traditional Georgian dishes yourself with the help of amazing chefs! Come bake your own khachapuri, fold khinkali, and enjoy the experience with friends or foreign guests. Restaurant doors are open to everyone with love.
reviewsOrAdvice: A unique culinary experience where you can learn to cook Georgian dishes with expert chefs.

name: Mini-Art
reviewsOrAdvice: Combines a cozy cafe atmosphere with an intriguing art gallery.

name: Tea House Foe-Foe
description: charming spot in Kutaisi, Georgia, where visitors can enjoy a relaxing tea or coffee break amidst antique Georgian furniture. The teahouse is known for its cozy atmosphere and makes for the perfect place to unwind after exploring the city.
reviewsOrAdvice: Perfect for a relaxing break, offering tea/coffee in an antique setting.

name: Lilestan
description: Lilestan is a charming restaurant in Kutaisi that offers a delightful culinary experience, blending the rich flavors of Imeretian and Georgian cuisine with a modern twist. The venue boasts colorful decor and utensils, creating one of the coziest atmospheres in the city. Visitors can expect an aristocratic atmosphere, bohemian and vintage style environment, and attentive staff with genuine smiles.
reviewsOrAdvice: Experience a cozy and aristocratic atmosphere with a modern twist on Georgian cuisine.

name: Fleur
description: Cafe Fleur in Kutaisi is a popular breakfast spot that opens at 9 am, earlier than most cafes. Guests can enjoy classic omelettes, shakshuka with homemade bread, or yogurt and fruit cups. The cafe offers beautifully decorated cappuccinos and has outdoor seating to enjoy the lively old town atmosphere. Visitors praise the attentive and friendly staff, unique menu offerings, reasonable prices, and a perfect garden for summertime.
reviewsOrAdvice: An excellent breakfast spot with a charming garden and friendly staff.

name: La Fete Kutaisi
description: Pastry, modern and traditional recipes, where quality is higher than price
reviewsOrAdvice: High-quality pastries blending modern and traditional recipes at great prices.

name: Newport Hotel Kutaisi
reviewsOrAdvice: A highly-rated hotel offering excellent comfort and service.

name: Agro guesthouse KORENA
location: Road to Gelati Monastery, Motsameta, Kutaisi 2708
reviewsOrAdvice: Experience warm hospitality and comfort in a unique guesthouse setting.

name: Hotel Terrace Kutaisi
reviewsOrAdvice: A well-regarded 3-star hotel with a comfortable terrace for guests.

name: Hill Hotel
reviewsOrAdvice: Offers a pleasant stay with good amenities at a reasonable price point.

name: Kutaisi Inn Hotel
reviewsOrAdvice: A premium 5-star hotel offering luxury and comfort for discerning travelers.
